multipleShipmentsAlert_plural: Your order will be sent as {{count}} separate deliveries. You'll only pay for one delivery
slotNotSelectedError: Please select from the available delivery slots to continue with your order.

ageRestriction.title: Age restriction
ageRestriction.message: Please tick box to confirm you are over 18. We operate a Think 25 age verification policy you may be asked for ID.
ageRestriction.checkBox: I certify that I am at least 18 years old.
ageRestriction.alertBox: Please indicate that you have read and agree to the terms.

getConsignmentError.retryMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try refreshing the page to see if that fixes the problem.
getConsignmentError.finalMessage: Sorry, there was still a problem with showing you delivery slots.

getSlotsError.retryMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try refreshing these slots to see if that fixes the problem.

noSlotsAvailable: Sorry, all of our slots are booked. Please try using a different postcode or collecting from a store.
specialDeliveryAlert: Sorry, we can’t book a delivery slot for your postcode right now. You can continue with your order and we’ll get in touch to arrange delivery soon.
